title: 89/417/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 June 1989 approving an amendment to the varietal conversion programme for hops submitted by the United Kingdom pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2997/87 (only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 June 1989
approving an amendment to the varietal conversion programme for hops submitted by the United Kingdom pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2997/87
(Only the English text is authentic)
(89/417/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the varietal conversion programme for hops submitted pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 2997/87 by the United Kingdom on 12 December 1988 is hereby approved. The main aspects of that programme as amended are summarized in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 June 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 284, 7. 10. 1987, p. 19.
(2) OJ No L 177, 24. 6. 1989, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 365, 24. 12. 1987, p. 41.
(4) OJ No L 60, 5. 3. 1988, p. 33.
(5) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1989, p. 15.
ANNEX
1. List of producer groups covered by the programme and 1986 reference areas
- English Hops Limited: 3 050 ha
- Hawkbrand hops: 313,6 ha
2. Duration of programme: from 22 September 1987 to 30 August 1990.
At all events the last planting must be carried out before 31 December 1990.
3. Areas covered by the programme:
- English Hops Limited: 717 ha,
- Hawkbrand hops: 70 ha.
